content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-15.5, 20.5), (-15.5, 21.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
- Stone furnaces at positions(5.0, -73.0) and (-18.0, -49.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to boiler fuel
- Ensure that coal is available in your inventory before attempting to refuel the boiler. 
- Check the boiler's status after refueling to confirm it is operational.

### Errors when inserting items
- The second argument in the `insert_item` function must be an Entity or EntityGroup. Ensure you are passing the correct entity instead of a position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
